text: Sredi litsemerov yest' gruppa, kotoraya postroila mechet' ne vo imya Allakha, a chtoby nanesti vred i poseyat' neveriye i raskol v ryadakh veruyushchikh. Eti lyudi budut klyast'sya, chto oni postroili mechet', zhelaya tol'ko blaga i dobra, no Allakh svidetel'stvuyet o nikh, chto oni - lzhetsy i sleduyut lozhnoy vere
